page.title: 04The Village Hall
page.content: The village hall is run by a committee appointed by the villagers.The village hall provides all sorts of activities such as the drama group,Derby Tone Club,play group and ladies badminton. The Caverswall and District Parish Council meet there every month. The plays are put on three times a year by anyone who comes reguarly to the village hall.People can book the hall for Wedding receptions and dances etc.The hall was started in 1934,and all ages visit the hall,but some clubs, of course only apply to a certain age group. The chairman and treasurer meet on the second Tuesday of every month except August to discuss financial matters.Every year the committee has a vote to elect a new chairperson,it must be a unanimous decision.
